RelatedSentence: Norwegian imports of textiles and other goods create thousands of jobs in developing countries .

RelatedSentence: We must do whatever we can to ensure that the textile industry has safe workplaces with decent pay and good working conditions - for both men and women , says Minister of International Development Heikki Eidsvoll Holmås .
